sentences.en: Do you teach your students singly or in groups?
sentences.cn: 你教学生是个别地教还是按组教?

sentences.en: Experience keeps no school ; she teaches her pupils singly.
sentences.cn: 经验无学堂,各人自己闯.

sentences.en: Let us consider each point singly.
sentences.cn: 让我们把每一点逐个加以考虑.

sentences.en: More enterprising dancers, singly or in couples , frequently broke into brief improvisations.
sentences.cn: 更富于想象力的舞蹈者常突然独自或成对作短暂的即兴舞.

sentences.en: Plant the trees singly or in small groups.
sentences.cn: 把这些树单棵或成小片种植。

sentences.en: Some went as mercenary soldiers , others as merchants or craftsmen, some in organized groups , others singly.
sentences.cn: 他们要么作为雇佣军, 要么作为商人或工匠艺人; 要么有组织地成群结队或单独前往.

sentences.en: The holy strain arose singly on the breathing silence of the wilderness.
sentences.cn: 只有那圣洁的旋律在荒野和孤寂中时起时落的宁静中荡漾.

sentences.en: The materials can be used singly or in combination.
sentences.cn: 这些材料可以单独使用也可以混合用.

sentences.en: The stamps are available singly or in books of ten.
sentences.cn: 邮票有单枚的，也有十枚一册的。

sentences.en: The world is unique to Fu, misfortunes never come singly . The U.
sentences.cn: 这个世界真是福无双至、祸不单行.

sentences.en: These four causes do not operate singly.
sentences.cn: 这四个原因并不单个起作用.

sentences.en: These various distinguished individuals came and went , singly as a rule.
sentences.cn: 这些著名人物照例是独来独往.

sentences.en: When sorrows come, they come not singly but in battalions.
sentences.cn: 当悲痛的事降临时,总不会单行, 它们是接踵而来.

sentences.en: Why is the person has bad luck always misfortunes never come singly?
sentences.cn: 为什么人倒霉总是祸不单行 啊 ?

sentences.en: Willam Ellery Channing wrote, " Men , it is justly said, can do jointly what they cannot do singly. "
sentences.cn: 威廉·艾勒立·钱宁写道: “ 公平而论; 人联合起来能做双手做不到的事. ”

sentences.en: William Ellery Channing wrote, " Men, it is justly said , can do jointly what they cannot do singly. "
sentences.cn: 威廉?艾勒立?钱宁写道: “ 公平而论; 人联合起来能做双手做不到的事. ”

words.tran_cn: 逐一地；个别地；各自地；直截了当地

trans.tran_cn: 单独地，单身地，单个地，单枪匹马地
trans.tran_en: alone, or one at a time
